prefs-vector-enable-vector-1-help:
Yuma din be tooni kanna, ti nyɛla ban yɛn kpaŋsiri vector nahiŋgbana ŋɔ. Vector fali ŋɔ ni che ka a tooi nyari yɛlikura zaŋ kpa vector (as of December 2019). A yi bɔri ni a deei baŋsim zaŋ kpa bee ninneesim, nyin yoomi [[mw
:Reading/Web/Desktop_Improvements|project page]].
vector-opt-out: Yihi ŋa labisi din di be shɛm ni
vector-opt-out-tooltip: Taɣimi a seetibu n-labisi din di pun be shɛm ni (legacy Victor)
